text.0: men call on indra in the armed encounter that he may make the hymns they sing decisive.
text.1: hero rejoicing in thy might in combat give us a portion of the stall of cattle.
text.2: grant indra maghavan invoked of many to these my friends the strength which thou possessest.
text.3: thou maghavan hast rent strong places open unclose for us wise god thy hidden bounty.
text.4: king of the living world of men is indra of all in varied form that earth containeth.
text.5: thence to the worshipper he giveth riches may he enrich us also when we laud him.
text.6: maghavan indra when we all invoke him bountiful ever sendeth strength to aid us.
text.7: whose perfect guerdon never failing bringeth wealth to the men to friends the thing they covet.
text.8: quick indra give us room and way to riches and let us bring thy mind to grant us treasures.
text.9: that we may win us cars and steeds and cattle preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
